meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the April 2, 2024, Charter Review Commission Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Establish the Office of Inspector General
agenda_items.description: Establish the Office of Inspector General in the city charter with the Inspector General being appointed by city council.

agenda_items.title: Final review of included amendments list
agenda_items.description: Final review of included amendments list and approval of the commission’s final report to city council.

agenda_items.title: Items for inclusion in the Chair’s comments to city council
agenda_items.description: Discussion of items to be included in the Chair’s comments to city council.

agenda_items.title: Charter Review Commission Communications and Outreach Summary
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the communications and outreach summary.
